name: The Beautiful Past
description:
In The Beautiful Past, you play as a stranded chrononaut who needs to get back to his home year of 3042. To get to the time portals which would allow him to do this, he must steal the beauty of all civilians around him. By murdering them in cold blood. It's only three levels but I hope to expand it in the future.

Controls:

WASD / arrows - Move

Return - Attack

ESC - Pause

Credits:

Programming, music, story, most art - Not A  Bot

Player and civilian sprites - rvros
